datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 55 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each MOUNTED, CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can also transport up to 1 RHINO model (this model – and any models embarked within it – take up the space of 25 models).

datasheets.name: Mastodon

datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 45 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can also transport up to 2 DREADNOUGHT or HELBRUTE models (these models take up the space of a number of models equal to their Wounds characteristic e.g. A DREADNOUGHT with a Wounds characteristic of 8 would take up the space of 8 models).
